author: nicko
msg: Committed patch from LOG4NET-97: Make Hierarchy's ILoggerFactory aware of the repository's LevelMap.
This is a breaking change to ILoggerFactory, but is required to ensure that the factory is aware of the repository and therefore its LevelMap

author: ehatcher
msg: introduced FlareContext, added saved search feature, and made things more configurable through SOLR_ENV

msg: o Fix ServerFactoryBean so you can specify your own DestinationFactory and add
